text:
GRAB here using the address attach in the picture.
The best place for all your Airbus training and simulators.
Cleanliness 10/10
simulators are mostly new, there’s even a prayers room (picture) second floor.
Massive place for briefings and also classes.
Largest A350 sim globally.
Top aviation companies send their pilots here for proficiency check annually.
Place is 24/7 running.
Includes multiple simulators for
ATR
A320
a330
a350
Pantry provides free drinks which include the necessary coffee and hot chocolate.
Lavatory is amazingly clean and fresh even In the wee morning.
A place to buy all your Airbus souvenirs at ground floor shop. U can get the highly sought after Airbus jacket to the limited edition Airbus thermos. Be advised only cashless transactions to purchase at the shop.

We went for dinner on a Friday night so naturally it was quiet - kids were happy with the table soccer, adults happy with wine available. Pizzas & giant ravioli were our favorites! There's asahi extra dry on tap too
Nice and clean training facilities. Great experience to visit this place.
Like the cleanliness, very tidy and professionally organized.. was here for A350 simulator sessions good spot for pilot check-in’s…

Was here for visit . Only 3 sims at that time. Very new building and modern look
Nice lobby with cafeteria..
